dict.string: Alfred workflow for todoist. Create tasks from alfred.

#!/bin/zsh
myString=$(echo {query})
finalContent=$myString every=$(echo $myString | grep -oE '\b(?:on|next|every|this)?\b[[:blank:]]?(?:monday|tuesday|wednesday|thursday|friday|saturday|sunday|weekend|weekends|week|month|year)' | xargs) if [[ $every != '' ]]; then finalContent=${finalContent//$every} fi
myDate=$(echo $myString | grep -oE '\b(?:today[[:blank:]]?|tomorrow[[:blank:]]?|at[[:blank:]]?)?\b[0-9]?[0-9]?(?:am|pm)?' | xargs) if [[ $myDate != '' ]]; then finalContent=${finalContent//$myDate} fi
finalContent=$(echo $finalContent | xargs) finalDueString='today' if [[ $every != '' || $myDate != '' ]]; then if [[ -z "$every" ]]; then finalDueString=$myDate else finalDueString=$(echo $every $myDate | xargs) fi
data=$(echo '{"content": '\"${finalContent}\"', "due_string": '\"${finalDueString}\"', "due_lang": "en"}')
curl -v "https://api.todoist.com/rest/v2/tasks" \ --data ${data} \ -H "Content-Type: application/json" \ -H "X-Request-Id: $(uuidgen)" \ -H "Authorization: Bearer ${token}" \ -H "Connection: close" else data=$(echo '{"content": '\"${finalContent}\"', "due_string": '\"${finalDueString}\"', "due_lang": "en"}')
curl -v "https://api.todoist.com/rest/v2/tasks" \ --data ${data} \ -H "Content-Type: application/json" \ -H "X-Request-Id: $(uuidgen)" \ -H "Authorization: Bearer ${token}" \ -H "Connection: close" fi
